title: Election 2012 exit polls : percentage of votes by income
summary: Overall Barack Obama is gradually increasing, Mitt Romney is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The order of lines according to average values of SOME LABEL, in descending order is: 1. Barack Obama, and lastly, 2. Mitt Romney.
The difference of SOME LABEL between Barack Obama and Mitt Romney is greater at Year Under_30000 compared to the Year 50000_or_more.
